content: We're planning to use https://www.wonder.me/ for the social gatherings at Lean Together in January. I'd like to test it out (with more than two people) before the official event. So let's try a slightly bigger gathering on Tuesday: a "holiday party" at 2020-12-22T12:00:00-05:00 (noon EST). Cocktail hour for the Europeans, lunchtime on the east coast, morning coffee on the west coast. Come hang out and chat for a bit!
Us east coasters are drinking happy hour at noon at this point in 2020 too.
FYI the link for the registration form doesn't seem to be working. Might only be temporary, I'll try again later.

Chris B said:

FYI the link for the registration form doesn't seem to be working. Might only be temporary, I'll try again later.

It's working for me (just links to a Google form), so hopefully just a glitch.
do you have a link for whatever thing is happening today?
if by "works" you mean "plays christmas music" then yes it works
Yeah, that got annoying after 10 seconds, luckily it can be disabled!
this virtual movement is so fancy, it's like the antiquarantine
